snippet: More than 60 miners were killed this week in the Darfur region when the gold mine they were working in collapsed, a police spokesman said Thursday.
abstract: More than 60 miners are killed in Darfur region of Sudan when gold mine collapses.
lead_paragraph: More than 60 miners were killed this week in the Darfur region when the gold mine they were working in collapsed, a police spokesman said Thursday.

headline.main: Sudan: Dozens Die in Gold Mine
headline.print_headline: Sudan: Dozens Die in Gold Mine
